channel.title: Dont lose items?
channel.description:
Can someone please tell me how I can make a specific player not lose their items when they die? -or- Can you tell me how to add a random drop so when a player is killed it drops random stuff, and not the players items?
thanks much =]

item.title: Dont lose items?
item.dc:creator: @AfterLifeLochie AfterLifeLochie
item.description:
@AfterLifeLochie wrote:

The method removeAllItems() dumps the contents of the users inventory. When the user dies, this is called. Comment it out or remove it completley and it wonâ€™t dump items.

Read full topic
